channel.title: generative art on Alicia Guo

item.title: on daily generation and planting seeds
item.description: a reflection on a month-ish of daily-ish sketches and the seeds that they nourished - check them out here ðŸ¤— On what it means to continue creating art1: “…it means leaving some loose thread, some unresolved issue, to carry forward and explore in the next piece…it means always carrying within you the seed crystal for your next destination.” The First Seed Sometime around October, I participated with some friends in a coding cypher as part ofÂ a collaboration between MIT and Lupe Fiasco where we had the creative freedom to create pretty much anything artistic from a very vague prompt.
